page.title: 01BORDER BYWAYS
page.content: In our area we have Darnick, Gattonside and part of Tweedbank, Langlee and Melrose.We have a ruined Abbey, a national trust shop,several plant nurseries in{Melrose}and a new hospital still being built near{ {Darnick}.It was begun in 1984 and will be opened in 1987.At{Tweedbank}we have a running track,bowling green,BMX track and other sports facilities.The{ {Tweed}is the major river here.We can ride, cycle,run and take part in local competitions.We have a few old places like churches,an abbey and several houses.Most of our{area}is used for cow and sheep farming or crops.We also have mills,shops,factories and other industries.We have a few small museums as well.There are gardens around { {Melrose}.There are several nice walks as well.
